word_mean: 牛痘：乳牛的一种轻度自限性发疹皮肤病，主要局限于乳房和乳头，由牛痘病毒引起，人类感染偶然发生，例如当为一感染的动物挤奶时
其原发损害(疱疹)通常见于手指上，可能破裂，扩散至手和邻近区域，且常痊愈而不留疤痕。可伴有局部水肿，淋巴管炎和区域性淋巴结炎，有或无发热。挤奶者可将此病传播至未受感染的牛。牛痘不应与副牛痘(parava c cinia)(挤奶者结节或小结)混淆。参见va c cinia。英国医师Jenner于1798年首次论证种痘，指出接种从牛痘病损所获物质可对天花免疫

sentence.Network_en: One day a girl came to see him who had a cowpox sore on her hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 一天一个女孩儿来看他,女孩儿手上有个牛痘疮.

sentence.Network_en: The discovery of the cowpox vaccination let the danger of vaccination more less, and cost lest.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛痘术的发明使种痘的危险性更小, 花费也降到最低,故而很快在全世界推广开来.

sentence.Network_en: In nineteen century, Enligh doctor Pearson came to Macao to spread the cowpox vaccination.
sentence.Network_cn: 到19世纪时, 英国医师皮尔逊到澳门推广牛痘术.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生物词汇 A-F (2)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... Cowper's gland 高柏氏腺,尿道球腺 Cowpox 牛痘 Cramp 痉挛.

list.abs: (一)发病原因牛痘病毒(cowpox virus)所致，它与痘病毒相似，在鸡胚囊膜上培养时，能产生出血性损害。(二)发病机制

means.word_mean: 1. a viral disease of cattle causing a mild skin disease affecting the udder; formerly used to inoculate humans against smallpox

auth_sentence.content: Jenner subsequently proved that having been inoculated with cowpox Phipps was immune to smallpox.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jenner subsequently proved that having been inoculated with cowpox Phipps was immune to smallpox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jenner subsequently proved that having been inoculated with cowpox Phipps was immune to smallpox.

auth_sentence.content: Jenner inserted pus taken from a cowpox pustule and inserted it into an incision on the boy's arm.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jenner inserted pus taken from a cowpox pustule and inserted it into an incision on the boy's arm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jenner inserted pus taken from a cowpox pustule and inserted it into an incision on the boy's arm.
